metadata.title: CVE-2022-22968 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Spring Framework versions 5.3.0 - 5.3.18, 5.2.0 - 5.2.20, and olderunsupported versions, the patterns for disallowedFields on a DataBinder arecase sensitive which means a field is not effectively protected unless itis listed with both upper and lower case for the first character of thefield, including upper and lower case for the first character of all nestedfields within the property path.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
